sense.def:
Snov ali predmet, ki je
solid
, je v trdem agregatnem stanju, ne pa v tekočem ali plinskem.

seg.quote: The basic choice is gas, electricity, or solid fuel.
Even the sea around them is frozen solid.

sense.def:
A solid
je trda in čvrsta snov.

seg.quote: You must at least know whether it's a solid or a liquid or a gas.

sense.def:
Predmet ali gmota, ki je
solid
, v sebi nima praznega prostora za ničesar, pa tudi nikakršnih lukenj ali praznin.

seg.quote: The car park was packed solid.

sense.def:
Predmet, ki je narejen
of solid gold
ali
of solid oak
, je v celoti narejen iz tega materiala, na primer iz zlata ali hrasta.

Zgradba, ki je
solid
, je močna in ni verjetno, da bi se sesula.

seg.quote: ...large houses built solidly of wooden planks.

sense.def:
Državljan, ki je
solid
, je ugleden in se ljudje lahko zanesejo nanj.

seg.quote: She regarded them as solid, good, dull people.

sense.def:
Kar je
solid
, je zanesljivo, močno in po obsegu veliko.

seg.quote: ...a veteran British Council worker, with solid experience in Asia and Africa.
They are solidly behind the proposal.
...giving an added strength and solidity to the state.

gramGrp.pos:
ATTRIB ADJ
or
ADJ
after
N

sense.def:
To do something for a solid period of time
pomeni nekaj delati vse navedeno obdobje brez prekinitve ali odmora.

seg.quote: I read for two hours solid.
If you work for ten weeks solidly you might stand more of a chance.
